actions.action: Provide feedback (positive or negative) on the barcode package and help make it better. Thanks!
Escape special characters in Code 128 messages.
Implement Australian Post Customer Barcode based on FourState base implementation.
Special bitmap generation mode that allows for the narrow bar to match exactly one pixel (smallest possible bitmap to paint the barcode in).
Optimize generation of 2D barcodes in EPS using monochrome bitmaps.

Fix problems with the SAXON 6.x integration: XML prolog generated by an XML fragment included in the output stream. (SAXON 6 will no longer be improved. The SAXON 8 extension can take its place. Keeping this item just as a reminder.)

release.action: Added OSGi metadata to barcode4j.jar and barcode4j-light.jar.
Bugfix for DataMatrix when character 0x0060 (`) is encountered.
Fixed PDF417 high-level encoding: shift to byte must not reset text encoding's sub-mode.
Fixed stray "Content is not allowed in prolog" message caused by the PreloaderBarcode's underlying XML parser by switching from Transformer to DocumentBuilder for XML loading.
Fixed mistake in an error message of the EAN-13 implementation.
Changed SVG production to make it compatible with Firefox (no use of CSS style attributes).
Fixed a NullPointerException in PreloaderBarcode.
Adding a filter for non-printable ASCII characters for the human-readable part of Code128 so these characters don't mess it up.
Fixed a bug concerning size calculation for Code39.
Added support for ITF-14.
Added support for restricting Code128 codesets to A, B, C or a combination.
Bugfix for an StringIndexOutOfBoundsException with PDF417 (single trailing punctuation character in mixed sub-mode).

Added plug-ins for the image loading framework in Apache XML Graphics Commons. This enables, among other things, barcodes in Apache FOP for RTF output and for the new intermediate format being developed.
Added a Apache Ant task for generating barcodes inside Ant scripts.
Support in FOP extensions for escaping characters that are not encodable in XML, such as RS or GS. Java Unicode escaping syntax is used: \u001e
Support added for a deletion placeholder when formatting the human-readable part.
Codabar: Option to suppress/display the start/stop characters in the human-readable part like for Code39.
DataMatrix: Added support restricting the desired symbol sizes.
DataMatrix: Added support for referencing binary data through URLs (RFC 2397 data URLs, too).
Bugfix for sub-mode switch from Punctuation to Alpha in PDF417.
Added support for the Code 39 extended character set.
Added support for left, right, center and justify alignment of the human-readable part.
Added an implementation for USPS Intelligent Mail (4-State Customer Barcode).
Various improvements and bugfixes for EAN-128.
Bugfix for text painting at small text sized when anti-aliasing is disabled.
Fixed two bugs concerning Base 256 encoding (DataMatrix).
Added auto-sizing feature for PDF417 with an option to specify the width-to-height ration for the symbol.
Improved Code128 encoding results in smaller barcodes in some cases.
Added support for Macro 05/06 character abbreviation (DataMatrix).
Fixed pattern handling: Trailing pattern text was omitted.
Added the possibility to restrict the generation of DataMatrix to square or rectangular symbols.
Fixed default values for POSTNETBean (so they match the values defined in DMM 708).
Fixed several problems in PDF417 (high-level encoding).
Fixed a bug in DataMatrix (more specifically with EDIFACT encodation).
Fixed a bug in the DataMatrix look-ahead test for high-level encoding.
Fixed row-height setting for PDF417 which was completely ignored.
Fixed the registration of all barcode types in the FOP 0.20.5 extension. PDF417 and DataMatrix didn't work in 2.0 alpha 1.
Added support for orientation in the FOP 0.20.5 extension.
Added a feature for applying a formatting pattern to the human-readable message (for Interleaved 2 of 5, Code 39, Code 128 and Codabar).
Adjusted SAXON 8 extension to versions 8.7.1 and later. This was necessary because of backwards-incompatible changes in the extensions API after the 8.0 release.
Added an initial version of a EAN-128 implementation.
Bugfix: Skip generating metadata using ImageIO if it's not writable (as for image/bmp in JDK 1.5)
Added an initial version of a DataMatrix implementation.
Added a Royal Mail Customer Barcode implementation. This is a "four state" barcode. The base implementation can also be used for other four state barcodes later.
Added support for barcode orientation (0, 90, 180 and 270 degrees).
Made logic handlers local to a barcode where appropriate to reflect reality and provide greater flexibility.
Added a PDF417 implementation.
Added extension for the redesigned Apache FOP.
For Code128, the font descender has to be added to the overall barcode height so lower-case characters don't get clipped.
Documentation updates.
For Interleaved 2 of 5, Code 39 and POSTNET, added the ability to include the generated checksum in the human-readable part. For Code39, the start and stop characters can also be enabled.
Barcode XML for the human-readable part is now different, all parameters sub-elements of a "human-readable" element.
POSTNET now displays the correct expected checksum character.
Added a sample applet to demonstrate barcodes on the website and the use of the Bean-API in conjunction with Java2D/AWT-drawing.
Barcode4J now has a Bean-style API making Avalon Framework an optional dependency. The build produces a new JAR, barcode4j-light.jar, which only contains the non-Avalon-Framework-dependant classes.

Barcode4J is now under the Apache License, Version 2.0. The Copyright name has been changed from Nicola Ken Barozzi to Jeremias Maerki. The latter was requested by Nicola Ken Barozzi and was approved through community decision. At least 95% percent of the code has been developed by Jeremias Maerki anyway.
SVG generators now create a viewBox and work with logical units instead of with real world units.
Changed internal unit for font sizes from points to millimeters to faciliate SVG generation with a viewBox attribute.
Added an XSLT extension for SAXON 8.x.
Fixed FOP extension to work with the AWT renderer.
Bug 942246: Fixed a bug in the default Code 128 encoder for FNC1 commands in codeset C.
"Krysalis Barcode" renamed to "Barcode4J" and moved to its own SourceForge project.
Added support for font and font size (human-readable part) from barcode XML, the servlet and the example webapp.
Fixed a mistake in the FOP extension so it accepts the message in both the "message" and "msg" attributes.
Allow lowercase a-z in Code39 symbols.
Fixed bug where Krysalis Barcode failed under JDK 1.3.x when compiled under JDK 1.4.x (ImageIO not present).
Moved responsibility for instantiating a Canvas object from the user to the barcode implementation. Simplification for users.
Display a full list of supported MIME types in the command line application.
Add support for passing resolution information into the generated bitmaps.
Extended Xalan extension to handle barcode XML just like the SAXON extension instead of using the generate function.
Added an extension for the SAXON XSLT Processor from Michael Kay.
Added FOP extension for FOP 0.20.5 and an experimental extension with native output support (for EPS and PDF, not going via SVG/Batik).
Support for inches in lengths.
Added POSTNET implementation.
Improved DOM to Avalon Configuration conversion.
Extended sample webapp to support the new output formats.
Full command-line interface.
Add Java2D (Graphics2D/AWT) output support.
Add bitmap output support.
Added EPS (Encapsulated PostScript) output support.
Improve usability of sample web application. Error result in a SVG that shows the detailed error message.
Reestablished JDK 1.3 compatibility.
Fixed OutOfMemoryError problem with long Code128 messages by rewriting the message encoder. The encoder is also factored out as an interface so plugging in custom implementations is possible.
Added support for supplementals (UPC and EAN barcodes).
Added an EAN-8 implementation.
Added a UPC-E implementation.
Fixed size calculation for Interleaved 2 of 5 and Code 128.
Nicer UPC-A painting.
Fixed painting of symbols without human-readable message.
Improved checksum configuration (mode="add|check|ignore|auto" instead of add-checksum/enable="yes|no").
Refactored BarcodeUtil into a Singleton to make usage easier.
Added some initial content to the website.
Initial Import
